column5: Hi Wayne, we mety briefly at Lakair a couple weeks back. Very sorry to read the news of your sister.  My condolences to you and the entire family.
My deepest sympathies for your loss!!
Wayne,  My sincere condolences.  Mark
My deepest condolences Wayne
Will be thinking of you and your family today.....  J...
THANKS everyone from the bottom of my heart ! Have tried to reply to some of your PM's here from the hotel, but it keeps crashing their computer.  3 hours to go and it's suit time...  Wayne
My condolences to you and your family Wayne.
Was thinking of you all morning here Wayne.  Hope all goes well and our thoughts are with you today my friend.  Joey & Paul

I'd like to THANK everyone for helping the family through this tough time. Some of you have gone above and beyond to help us deal with this huge "bump in the road".  As I said earlier I printed out all the Condolences for my Mother, oldest sister and brother and all were very touched by your comments and have each taken a copy home to read and browse thru.  It's also amazing how such solid friendships can be formed on a fishing forum. How many would go to this much trouble for someone they met on the internet?? I just wish he'd start taking pictures of Fern changing and not himself. Dano and Fern drove all the way from the other side of Orangeville to attend the funeral (and to hold my hand). They don't come finer than this. But next time Dan... get changed in the hotel or something. Not in the Smiths Falls Walmart parking lot! LMAO !  (No Dogs were harmed during the taking of this photo.... LMAO!)
My condolences Wayne.
my condolences to you and your family. My thoughts are with you.
your right Wayne I just got to this post...my condolences.
Nice legs, Dan.
My deepest condolences to you and your family Wayne.  Take Care man!!
me and my family have gone through it a few times in the last couple of years.  stay close and remember the good, mike
I am so sorry Wayne. Nothing I can say can help right now but later when you read these posts it might help. Try to keep your chin up.   darren

Thanks everyone for your thoughts!  Long day.. 2 hours of fighting to get into her apartment and 11 hours searching thru boxes/drawers/bags of paperwork. Unfortunately just like me she has every piece of paper, bank statement etc right back to the days we went to University together in Toronto thru '78-81. And I mean every friggin piece of paper and no filing system what so ever.  Gave up waiting on the Coroner to call... 2 1/2 days of calling the Durham Police with them "promising the Coroner will call.. nothing we can do". At 4 Pm today Leah grabbed the yellow pages and started calling Hospitals. When she finally found Wendy they were piss ed off that nobody had claimed the body yet. My Mother is beside herself... and I'm damn sure I have an ulcer.  Found a will... main good part of the day.  Bad part... best I can figure from hacking into her hotmail account is her emails are all read on the 23rd of June... not on the 25th. 25th of June Newspaper in her apartment. Dead on the floor for 2 weeks goddamit !  Smile of the day, after 11 hours of searching and loading. Go get her truck in the parking lot.. open the back window to put a few boxes in and moved some coats... looks like she was afraid the liquor store was going on strike at midnight on the 23rd..... a good collection of Rye in the back! Guess she's covered the memorial toast for all of us !  Wayne

Wow Wayne, that's rough. So sorry to hear.  At least you've found a little light through this dark time. Don't s'pose there's any ginger ale in the fridge to go with that rye, is there?  Keep the family close & it'll get better.
No.. but there is also about 60 litre bottles of pepsi in there.... lol
That'll work too....
Thanks Bill for the chuckles.... give Mike a call tomorrow will ya...
Those smiles and chuckles will keep you going Wayne...remember the good times and smile every chance you get.
My condolences to you and your family Wayne.
Arrangements tentatively at this point pending her transfer  Tuesday July 13th, visitation 1 to 3 pm with funeral immediately following.  Lannin's Funeral Home Main St Smiths Falls, Ontario

Sorry to hear all the troubles you've been having getting this sorted out Wayne.  Glad you can find some kind of chuckle out of the whole affair at this point.  I'm sure your sister is looking down at you chuckling herself and hoping you have a drink on her tonight.  Laughter keeps us all going.  I remember as my Grandmother, mother, aunt, sister and I were viewing my grandfather in is coffin all teary eyed, a grasshopper jumped off the floral arrangement onto his face.  It was not expected and we all burst into laughter, and at that point with all our emotions, got hysterical and could not stop laughing.  I'm sure everyone thought we were nuts, but it got us through and we hugged and laughed and cried together.  Be strong!!  Joey
Very sorry to hear about your loss, our condolences to you and the family.
So very sorry to hear this news Irish.  Condolences from my family to yours my friend!
i'm so sorry for your loss , you have my deepest sympathies
Sorry to hear that Wayne . Cheryl and I send our condolences. dave

I am so very sorry for your loss, 49 is just way too young!  From the pictures she looks like quite a gal, I would imagine she would want you to celibrate her life and not mourn her passing!  Our deepest condolences to you and your family Wayne.

Thanks again everyone !!  I've printed this out... all 50 pages of paper... to give my Mother, to show that there really are some good people left in this world !  ...of course edited to remove the booze ! lol We are still just little kids in her eyes....  Wayne
I'm so sorry to hear, 49 is too young for anyone and I can't imagine what you're going through!  My condolences to you and your family.
Having lost one of my sons (25), I can identify all too well. My condolences.
Wayne,remember when I did that for my aunt K when she was going through her trouble times..  You are so right.
Sorry for your loss Wayne and Family
That's terrible news Wayne, my condolences, were thinking of ya.
Very, very sorry to hear this happened Wayne, condolences.
Wow!! Sorry for your loss Wayne, Our thoughts and prayers are with you and your family at this sad time.

Wayne, very sorry for your loss.  Just terrible news to find on the board this morning.  If I can help in anyway just let me know, I drive through Ajax everyday.  My condolences to you and your family.

Wayne, our most sincerest condolences to you and your family. This is devastating news.  Everyone, for God's sake, keep in close touch with your family, you don't know what is going to happen, life is too short to do battle with and hold grudges with close family members. I know that life is busy, with 2 young girls at home we don't have a lot of time to see everyone that we would like to but I make a point to pick up the phone and talk to relatives and friends. It only takes a minute to say hi.

So sorry to hear of such bad news. My prayers go out to you and anyone close to your sister. I lost my mother when she was the same age just as suddenly.........and these youthful passings like this out of nowhere add so much more grief to an already difficult thing to deal with.
So sorry to hear of your sisters passing Wayne. A truly sorrowful thing to have happen. My heart goes out to you and your family.
You have my condolences Wayne.
Thats just too young man, best wishes to you and your family.  Stay strong brother.
Our thoughts and prayers are with your family.
My deepest sympathies to you and your family, Wayne. Sorry for your loss.
That’s terrible news Wayne.  I’m going to stop by my sisters on the way home from work and tell her I love her.  My condolences to you and yours.

A terrible way to lose a loved one . . . .    but . . .   being alone myself . . . .    I sometimes wonder if such a fate awaits me. I can't imagine what you must be feeling, but you can't blame yourself . . . .    sounds like this lady was VERY independent, and might have resented anyone 'checking up' on her. Perhaps your suggestion of 'keeping in touch regularly' with siblings will spare someone else this terrible ordeal.

Wayne  i know it won't help much right now but you have my deepest sympathy. it is one thing to watch it coming for years like my Chris but to have it happen that suddenly is hard to take. i will say a prayer for all of you.  Speed.
My deepest condolences Wayne , and mine and my families prayers are with you and your family.
My condolences Wayne.
Wayne that is very sad news in deed she looked so happy out there with you our condolences to you and your family  Mike and Family
Thank you for your advice, Wayne. We don't know each other, but my condolences on the loss of your sister. Chris
Cherish the memories and she will live forever ....my deepest condolences to you and your family for the loss

I've never met you Wayne but this awful incident brought tears to my eyes when I read it.... It's a tough pill to swallow and want to offer my sincerest condolences to you and your family.  I'd like to share a reply that was posted when my dad past away a few months ago and think is appropriate under this circumstance...   My thoughts and prayers are with you. Leechman
Sorry to hear of your loss... Its always a tough time, and my thoughts and prayers are with you and your family.
sorry for your loss wayne same age as me

Very, very sincere condolences Wayne & Leah. Just got in the door after a quick trip out of town and this was the first thread I read. I am speachless, especially as we were talking about her just last week. Anything that Barbara & I can do just give us a call.
Sorry for your loss Wayne. You have my condolences.
Wow,what you miss after a few days away from the computer.My deepest sympathies to you and your family Wayne. 49 is just way too young. Kerry

Sorry to read about it Wayne. Just few days ago when I spoke to you in Temagami you were expecting your mother and now this....not the thing anyone likes to have to deal with... My condolences to the whole family Bud.  Ice Fisherman
My deepest sympathies, i am very sorry for your loss.
My families prayers are with you bud.
Sorry to hear Wayne my condolences to you and your family  Rob
Im sorry to hear this news our families thoughts are with yours  Peter

Sir, news like this makes one thoughts go all over the place, try to remeber the too few great times that you shared together.  My heart and prayers go out to you and your family, look after your mother as she must be in shock.  FLEX
My condolences to you and your family Wayne.
Sorry to hear of your sister's passing Wayne, my condolences to you and your family.
So sorry to hear about your lost.....I'll say a prayer your family.  Jason
Geez Wayne, I am really sorry about your loss. Your poor sister, what a terrible thing to happen.
I don't know what to say Wayne, I'm sitting here absolutely dumbfounded.  Condolonces if course to you and your family.

Wayne and family, you have my heart felt sympathys. Wayne, I'm only a 10 minute drive to Ajax. Should you need a place to sit, clear your head or rest your head, please let me know. I have room for you and would be honored to have you stay. I'll PM my particulars. HH
I am sorry about your loss Wayne.  My deepest sympathy to you and your family.
My condolences to you and your family Wayne, hang in there bud.

My heartfelt condolences to your entire family Wayne.  Always remember to forget The things that made you sad. But never forget to remember The things that made you glad.  Always remember to forget The friends that proved untrue. But never forget to remember Those that have stuck by you.  Always remember to forget The troubles that passed away. But never forget to remember The blessings that come each day.   Take Care Phil

Wayne and Leah...when Carole told me about it, my heart sank for you.  So sorry to hear about her passing.  When you are in town, if you need anything at all...no matter how small, be sure to call us.  We are only 10 minutes from Ajax...
My condolences on your family’s loss.  Dan
My deepest condolences to you and your family   peps
My Condolences to you and your family Wayne
So sorry for your loss Wayne. She was taken at a young age. The pics you posted will remain some of your memories of happier times I'm sure.
Very sorry to hear Wayne, sincere condolences.
Sorry to hear of your loss Wayne and Leah.  Both Maribeth's and my prayers are with your family.
sorry to hear, deepest sympathies to you and your family wayne.. mike
Sorry to hear Wayne, My condolences to you and your family....  Sherriff
Sorry to hear that Wayne, my condolences.
condolences Wayne terrible news
Very sorry to read this Wayne.  My deepest sympathies go to you and your family.
sorry to hear of your loss my deepest condolences to you and your family
Wayne, I'm speechless  I can't even imagine losing my sister.  I'm truely sorry.  My condolances to you and your family.  Joey & Paul
my sincerest condolences irish. i'll call my sis tomorrow.
My condolences Wayne.
Sorry to hear of it bud.Lost my sister a long time ago.I still miss her. Joe
My condolences.  JP
our prayers are with you and your family...  sincerely,  Splashhopper and Botbot
Condolences to you and your family Wayne.
Wayne I am so sorry to hear of your deep loss. My deepest sympathies go out to you and your family. Take Care, Ted
Really sorry to hear that Wayne. My condolences to you and your family.

My condolences to you and your family... What a heartbreak..  My family and I are spending the weekend with my sister and their kids.. So looking forward to it.  It's times like this we reflect on what we should do and maybe should have done..  Take Care. Tiz
Very sorry to hear the news Wayne. All the best to you, your mother, family and friends.
Very tough to have to deal with.  Very sorry for your loss.
Sorry to hear for your loss. My condolences and best thoughts to your friends and family.  MTBF
You, and your family, have my deepest and sincerest condolences Wayne. It is ever so hard to accept when this happens without warning.
My condolences.
Wayne, I cannot even imagine what you are going through right now......our condolences and if there is anything that we can do to help, please do not hesitate to call.
My prayers and thoughts with you all during this hard time. I'm sure she knew how much you guys really loved her!

Thanks everyone... gonna try to get some sleep tonight. It sure didn't happen last night.  Carole... We'll be sure to grab your number before leaving for Ajax.... in case we need to get out of her apartment for a chat sometime during this mess.  Wayne
My deepest sympathies Wayne.
So sorry to hear this sad news Wayne. May Wendy rest in peace.
My condolences to you and your family Wayne  Maureen
My condolences to you and your family .
Your sister and your family is in my prayers tonite.   Craig
49 is just way, way too young.   Sorry to hear that Wayne.  Patsy and I express our deep condolences to you and your entire family.
Wayne, very sorry to hear of the loss of your sister.  Cindy and I send along our condolences.

We hadn't planned to be home until late September.....but I'm sitting here now, at home, waiting for the Coroner to call and let me know when they will release my sister Wendy's (49) body. We had the police attend her Ajax apartment yesterday afternoon because nobody had heard from her in a while and my wife Leah had a bad hunch and she was, unfortunately, right. Possibly dead on the floor for 6 days, since her Thursday July 2nd paper was still at her apartments hall door..... preliminary = instant cardiac arrest. I had my 83 year old mother at the lake at the time of this news and not something you ever want to have sit your mother down to tell her. We got my Mother on her way home from the lake this morning to start funeral arrangements and we got home around 4PM ourselves and have been waiting for the call from the Coroner all day... (that looks like it's not going to come today) and I'm off tomorrow to go through Wendy's apartment in search of a will, etc. and hope to be able to at least start funeral arrangements tomorrow.  Folks... Call your siblings and just say hello.... OFTEN !
sad to here Wayne.. RIP Wendy... you have my condolences.  G
sorry to hear this condolences to your family
Life truly is precious, thanks for the reminder. Very sorry for your loss.
So sorry for your loss Wayne My condolences to your family.  Tom.
very sorry to hear about your sudden loss, best wishes to you and your family during this time of sorrow.  jason
Sorry to hear of your loss Wayne and Leah.  Both mine and Bettys prayers are with your family my friends.
My deepest sympathies. I am very sorry for your loss.
Ah geez Wayne, I'm sorry.  I know what it's like to lose a sibling, not something I'd wish upon anyone.  Stay strong man.
Sorry to hear about your loss. Remember the good times you had as a family. My thoughts and prayers are with you and your family.  Todd.
my condolences, she's in heavin catching angel fish right now. thanks for tip will call my brothers and sisters
sincerest condolences Wayne
Very sad to loose a family member Wayne, you are right, we should all call more often.
My condolences to your family . Always sad when one goes so sudden. My family sends their thought and prayers out to yours.
sorry to hear this Wayne. My condolences to you and your family
Our condolences to you and your family from Adrianne and I.  Will keep you in our thoughts during this difficult time.

Wayne, I am so sorry to read this and hear of your sister's passing. What a terrible shame to go so young. I am 49 myself for a few more days and can't imagine something like this happening at this age.  You have my deepest condolences.  Brian
my thoughts are with you and yours Wayne ,way to young to say goodbye
Sorry to here about your sister Wayne. Condolences to you and your family. She will be in our prayers tonight..
My condolences to you and your family Wayne.
My deepest sympathies and condolences go out to you and your family, Wayne. It's always heartbreaking to lose someone, but especially at such a young age.  My thoughts are with you,  Salomon
Bren's and my deepest sympathies to you, Leah and yours.  Very sorry to hear.
My condolences.
Wayne, I'm sorry to hear that. It is never a good time, but 49 is much too young. Jim
Sorry for your loss. My condolences>
